panels.description: Can I withstand a node failure without workloads being affected

targets.expr:
(
  (
    vergeos_cluster_total_nodes{system_name=~"$system", cluster=~"$cluster"} > 0
  and
    vergeos_cluster_total_ram{system_name=~"$system", cluster=~"$cluster"} > 0
  )
  * on (system_name, cluster)
  (
    (vergeos_cluster_total_ram{system_name=~"$system", cluster=~"$cluster"} - vergeos_cluster_used_ram{system_name=~"$system", cluster=~"$cluster"})
    /
    (vergeos_cluster_total_ram{system_name=~"$system", cluster=~"$cluster"} / vergeos_cluster_total_nodes{system_name=~"$system", cluster=~"$cluster"})
  )
)

panels.title: RAM N+1
